Key Match Events: Cameron Payne finished the game with eight points, nine assists, and three steals
Pre-Game Insights: Jalen Brunson would be out due to tightness in his hamstring
Miles McBride was expected to start due to Jalen Brunson's absence
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks are just half a game behind the second seed
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cameron Payne and Tyler Kolek combined for 13 assists
Kolek scored 36 points and dished out 11 assists in his first regular-season G League game
